org.dyn4j.collision.broadphase

Interface BroadphaseDetector<E extends Collidable>

  • Type Parameters:
    E - the Collidable type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAABBDetector, DynamicAABBTree, SapBruteForce, SapIncremental, SapTree

    public interface BroadphaseDetector<E extends Collidable>
    Represents a broad-phase collision detection algorithm.

    A BroadphaseDetector should quickly determine the pairs of Collidables that possibly intersect. These algorithms are used to filter out collision pairs in the interest of sending less pairs to the NarrowphaseDetector.

    BroadphaseDetectors require that the collidables are updated via the update(Collidable) method when the collidables move, rotate, or are changed in anyway that changes their AABB.

    BroadphaseDetectors use a expansion value to expand the AABB of a collidable. The getAABB(Collidable) returns the expanded AABB. This expansion is used to reduce the number of updates to the broadphase. See the setAABBExpansion(double) for more details on this value.

    The detect(), detect(AABB), raycast(Ray, double) methods use the current state of all the collidables that have been added. Make sure that all changes have been reflected to the broadphase using the update(Collidable) method before calling these methods.

    The detect(Collidable, Collidable) and detect(Convex, Transform, Convex, Transform) methods do not use the current state of the broadphase.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.0
    Author:
    William Bittle

      Adds a new Collidable to the broadphase.

      • getAABB

        AABB getAABB(E collidable)
        Returns the expanded AABB for a given Collidable.

        Returns null if the collidable has not been added to this broadphase detector.

        Parameters:
        collidable - the Collidable
        Returns:
        AABB the AABB for the given Collidable

      • raycast

        java.util.List<E> raycast(Ray ray,
                        double length)
        Performs a preliminary raycast over all the collidables in the broadphase to improve performance of the narrowphase raycasts.
        Parameters:
        ray - the Ray
        length - the length of the ray; 0.0 for infinite length
        Returns:
        List the filtered list of possible collidables
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • detect

        boolean detect(E a,
             E b)
        Performs a broadphase collision test on the given Collidables and returns true if they could possibly intersect.
        Parameters:
        a - the first Collidable
        b - the second Collidable
        Returns:
        boolean

      • detect

        boolean detect(Convex convex1,
             Transform transform1,
             Convex convex2,
             Transform transform2)
        Performs a broadphase collision test on the given Convex Shapes and returns true if they could possibly intersect.

        This method does not use the expansion value.

        Parameters:
        convex1 - the first Convex Shape
        transform1 - the first Convex Shape's Transform
        convex2 - the second Convex Shape
        transform2 - the second Convex Shape's Transform
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getAABBExpansion

        double getAABBExpansion()
        Returns the AABB expansion value used to improve performance of broadphase updates.
        Returns:
        double

      • setAABBExpansion

        void setAABBExpansion(double expansion)
        Sets the AABB expansion value used to improve performance of broadphase updates.

        Increasing this value will cause less updates to the broadphase but will cause more pairs to be sent to the narrowphase.

        Parameters:
        expansion - the expansion

      • shiftCoordinates

        void shiftCoordinates(Vector2 shift)
        Translates all Collidable proxies to match the given coordinate shift.
        Parameters:
        shift - the amount to shift along the x and y axes
        Since:
        3.1.0
